scripts.deploy: function f() { graph auth --studio $1 && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ $2 ./$3/subgraph.yaml --network $4 ${@:5}; }; f
scripts.create-local: function f() { graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ $1; }; f
scripts.remove-local: function f() { graph remove --node http://localhost:8020/ $1; }; f
scripts.deploy-local: function f() { graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 $1; }; f
